A shining example of religious harmony in Lalmonirhat

A wooden boat lies stranded as the River Teesta dries up during the winter season, triggering erosion, acute water scarcity, and a severe livelihood crisis across the northern region, including Lalmonirhat, Rangpur, Kurigram, and Nilphamari districts. The agriculture, irrigation, and fisheries sectors are incurring substantial losses, leading to growing frustration and uncertainty among local communities. The photo was taken on Friday. -Hasan Ul Aziz
